Acharya Prashant is teaching how Indians can become better. Our image is not bad because people don't like us. We are not educated about our condition. IMAGE IS NOT A MOVI ABOUT INDIA. COLLEGE AND OFFICE PEOPLE ARE FOCUSED ON BOOKS AND WORK.indians are focused on samosa, biryani and mext food buffet and party. Every 2 hours we plan where to find spicy food and how to feast . Foreign countries have central ac buildings and windows are always closed. So the food smell stays on clothes, hair and the furniture you use . Everyone takes care that no strong deo, food and sweat smell is there. .
It's a new lifestyle. You cannot live in a foreign country and not change.
